pull.title: ci: Merge C++17 build with one of the existing ones
pull.body: No need to spin up an extra vm for each pull request for a simple sanity check that any of the other already running machines can test.

events.body:
Background is that the travis queue has a huge backlog. So we could either throw some more money at them, or (what seems simpler) not have that many configurations, most of which can be merged without any downside.

![Screenshot_2020-04-30 Pull Requests - bitcoin bitcoin - Travis CI](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6399679/80728294-c6ba0100-8ad4-11ea-8343-1b0676720bf3.png)
